sourcesContent:
import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import {data} from '../datas/data' import Header from '../components/Header' import '../assets/styles/Bien.scss' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faAngleDown, faAngleUp ,faAngleLeft,faAngleRight ,faStar } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' function Title() { const {id} = useParams() const bien = data.find((item)=>item.id===id) const host = bien.host const showTag =(tag) => { return tag.map((tag,index)=>( {tag} )) } const star = (rating) => { return Array.from({length:5},(_,index)=>( )) } return (

{bien.title}

{bien.location}
{host.name}
{showTag(bien.tags)}
{star(bien.rating)}
Descriprion Equipements
) } export default Title
